mapper.select: select * from noticeview where ${field} like '%${query}%' order by id desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
select count(id) count from notice where ${field} like '%${query}%'
select * from notice where regdate > (select regdate from notice where id = #{id}) limit 1
select * from notice where regdate < (select regdate from notice where id = #{id}) order by regdate desc limit 1
mapper.update: update set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, hit = #{hit}, pub = #{pub}, where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: inset into Notice(title, content, memberId) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{memberId})
